attributes.action: Increase the rate of the fibre optic broadband is being provided.
attributes.additional_details: Britain is the number one in Europe with the worst WiFi speeds although being 5 richest country in the world.
attributes.background: To make openreach spread out their fibre cables

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. 

We also can't publish petitions that include unverifiable or false information. We can't verify your claims about broadband speeds compared to other countries:

https://www.ispreview.co.uk/index.php/2019/07/uk-ranks-34th-out-of-207-countries-for-average-broadband-speed.html.
